info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Custer County through 300 PM MDT... At 222 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Custer State Park, or 9 miles east of Custer, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... State Game Lodge and Buffalo Corrals around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
